name: BOULE
description:
BOULE is barely a game, more of a tech demo with light interaction. Use the arrow buttons on the top-right to move the ball and reach the goal (it's a big green X).

NOTE: BOULE may require some horsepower to run at a good framerate. Sorry about that.

Made for the GAMES MADE QUICK??? 1½ jam.

Using threejs (3D engine), cannonjs(physics), and superguigui's threejs starter kit.
